RIMS Imphal Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Assistant Professor Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 23, 2025, 12:37 IST
 Regional Institute of Medical Sciences
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 23-Aug-2025 |  Manipur |  Salary : 123,500 to 123,500




FOLLOW

Regional Institute of Medical Sciences Imphal (RIMS Imphal) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Assistant Professor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MS can grab this chance and apply for the RIMS Imphal Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Manipur.

RIMS Imphal Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria.
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Assistant Professor 	01	MS

Age Limit for the RIMS Imphal Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 45 years.

Selection Process for the RIMS Imphal Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the RIMS Imphal Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 1,23,500 /- per month.

Application fee for the RIMS Imphal Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the RIMS Imphal Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Assistant Professor Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form along with the relevant documents to the address given below.

Address

Office of the Deputy Director, Regional Institute of Medical Sciences, Imphal, Manipur.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	23-08-2025
Last Date of Application	28-08-2025

 

Application form	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
